# The `ICFLoopSafetyInfo` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This implementation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopsafetyinfo">LoopSafetyInfo</a> use <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/implicitcontrolflowtracking">ImplicitControlFlowTracking</a> to give precise answers on &quot;may throw&quot; queries. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::ICFLoopSafetyInfo</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This implementation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopsafetyinfo">LoopSafetyInfo</a> use <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/implicitcontrolflowtracking">ImplicitControlFlowTracking</a> to give precise answers on &quot;may throw&quot; queries.

This implementation uses cache that should be invalidated by calling the methods insertInstructionTo and removeInstruction whenever we modify a basic block&#39;s contents by adding or removing instructions.

Definition at line 131 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/mustexecute-h">MustExecute.h</a>.

### blockMayThrow() {#a5c89300129b6640ff5930d605c4f2b3e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool ICFLoopSafetyInfo::blockMayThrow (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Returns true iff the block <code>BB</code> potentially may throw exception.

It can be false-positive in cases when we want to avoid complex analysis.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/mustexecute-h/#l00140">140</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/mustexecute-h">MustExecute.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/mustexecute-cpp/#l00069">69</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/mustexecute-cpp">MustExecute.cpp</a>.

### computeLoopSafetyInfo() {#aca2badb4637a1c884bebc80828feac0a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void ICFLoopSafetyInfo::computeLoopSafetyInfo (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; CurLoop)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Computes safety information for a loop checks loop body &amp; header for the possibility of may throw exception, it takes <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopsafetyinfo">LoopSafetyInfo</a> and loop as argument.

Updates safety information in <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopsafetyinfo">LoopSafetyInfo</a> argument. Note: This is defined to clear and reinitialize an already initialized <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopsafetyinfo">LoopSafetyInfo</a>. Some callers rely on this fact.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/mustexecute-h/#l00144">144</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/mustexecute-h">MustExecute.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/mustexecute-cpp/#l00077">77</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/mustexecute-cpp">MustExecute.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
